Extend your `{golem}` application with external JS libraries.

The goal of `{gemstones}` is to allow you to add some JavaScript libraries to your {golem} based app. `{gemstones}` will automate the download and the linking of some JS libraries, but it’s important to understand that `{gemstones}` is not providing a full wrapper or widget for these libraries. You’ll still have to code some elements to make it work.
